name:
Amun

      Ra
title: Amun-Ra - King of the Gods | Egyptian Mythology
subtitle:
King of the Gods
     
     , The Hidden Sun
shortDescription: Amun - Ra is the syncretic fusion of Amun (the hidden one ) and Ra (the sun). Supreme god of the New Kingdom, combining Amun 's mysterious transcendence with Ra 's manifest solar power . ' King of the Gods ' worshipped at Karnak's vast temple complex. Consort of Mut, father of Khonsu. Pharaohs claimed divine descent from Amun - Ra .
longDescription: Full detailed mythology and worship information coming soon. For now, see related deities and use the corpus search to explore ancient texts mentioning Amun - Ra .
